mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.title, a.user_id, a.cover_image, a.qrcode_path, a.is_markdown, a.content, a.content_md, a.top, a.type_id, a.`status`, a.recommended, a.original, a.editor_type, a.description, a.keywords, a.`comment`, a.`password`, a.`required_auth`, a.create_time, a.update_time, btype.id AS btype_id, btype.`name` AS btype_name, btype.description AS btype_description, t.id AS tag_id, t.`name` AS tag_name, t.description AS tag_description FROM biz_article a INNER JOIN biz_type btype ON a.type_id = btype.id INNER JOIN biz_article_tags atag ON a.id = atag.article_id LEFT JOIN biz_tags t ON atag.tag_id = t.id WHERE a.id = #{id}

( SELECT a.id, a.title, a.create_time FROM biz_article a WHERE a.create_time < #{insertTime} AND a.status = 1 ORDER BY a.create_time DESC LIMIT 1 ) UNION ALL ( SELECT a.id, a.title, a.create_time FROM biz_article a WHERE a.create_time > #{insertTime} AND a.status = 1 ORDER BY a.create_time LIMIT 1 )

SELECT a.id, a.title, a.user_id, a.cover_image, a.qrcode_path, a.is_markdown, a.top, a.type_id, a.`status`, a.recommended, a.original, a.editor_type, a.description, a.keywords, a.`comment`, a.create_time, a.update_time, l.lookCount AS look_count, c.commentCount AS comment_count FROM biz_article a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT l.article_id, IFNULL(count(1), 0) AS lookCount FROM biz_article_look l GROUP BY l.article_id ) l ON a.id = l.article_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT c.sid, IFNULL(count(1), 0) AS commentCount FROM biz_comment c WHERE c.`status` = 'APPROVED' GROUP BY c.sid ) c ON a.id = c.sid WHERE a.status = 1 ORDER BY l.lookCount DESC
SELECT COUNT(a.id) FROM biz_article a WHERE a.id = #{id}
